title: Research discredits theory that e-cigarettes make tobacco use socially acceptable

title_detail.value: Research discredits theory that e-cigarettes make tobacco use socially acceptable

summary: A study has cast doubt on the link suggested by some between the increased visibility of e-cigarette use and the renormalization of smoking. They may, authors suggest, may instead further discourage tobacco use.

summary_detail.value: A study has cast doubt on the link suggested by some between the increased visibility of e-cigarette use and the renormalization of smoking. They may, authors suggest, may instead further discourage tobacco use.
